dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4916 IH: Comprehensive Legislation for Expanding and Advancing Nonrestrictive Energy Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Kamlager-Dove (for herself, Mr. Grijalva, Ms. Lee of California, Ms. Clarke of New York, Ms. Norton, Mr. Scott of Virginia, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Carbajal, Ms. Lee of Pennsylvania, Mr. Ivey, Mr. Bowman, Mr. Beyer, Ms. Castor of Florida, Ms. Velázquez, Ms. Tlaib, Mr. Trone, Mr. Pallone, Ms. Titus, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, Mrs. Foushee, Mr. Espaillat, Mr. Mullin, and Mr. Huffman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 to repeal restrictions on onshore wind and solar.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Comprehensive Legislation for Expanding and Advancing Nonrestrictive Energy Act or the CLEAN Energy Act.

section.header: Repeal of onshore wind and solar leasing restrictions
section.text: Paragraph (1) of section 50265(b) of Public Law 117â€“169 (43 U.S.C. 3006(b)) is repealed.
